ta.title: බිල්පත් ගෙවීම් ගැන විදුලි පාරිභෝගිකයින්ට දැනුම්දීමක්
body_lines: ලංකා විදුලිබල මණ්ඩලය නව තාක්ෂණයට අනුගත වෙමින් විදුලි පාරිභෝගිකයන්හට සිය විදුලි බිල්පත් ගෙවීම සඳහා ක්‍රමවේදයන් රැසක් හඳුන්වා දී තිබේ.
නිවේදනයක් නිකුත් කරමින් ලංකා විදුලිබල මණ්ඩලය සඳහන් කර ඇත්තේ, මේ තුළින් වඩාත් කාර්යක්ෂම ලෙස බිල්පත් ගෙවීම් කටයුතු සිදුකළ හැකි බවය.
அதன்படி, CEBCARE மொபைல் பயன்பாடு, ஆன்லைன் வங்கி சேவைகள், CEB மற்றும் BANK KIOSS, CEB மற்றும் BANK KIOSS மற்றும் MCASH மின்சார அட்டை கட்டண வசதியைப் பெறுகின்றன.
மின்சார கட்டணங்கள் தொடர்பாக CEB கால் சென்டர் 1987 ஐக் குறிப்பிட சிலோன் மின்சார வாரியம் (இலங்கை மின்சார வாரியம்) தெரிவிக்கப்படுகிறது.

en.title: An informed of electricity payments about bill payments
body_lines: The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has been adapted to new technology and introduced many methods to pay their electrical bills.
The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has said that the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has made it more efficient.
Accordingly, by the CEBCare mobile app, online banking services, the CEB and Bank KIOSS, the CEB and Bank KIOSS, and MCASH receives the electricity card payment facility.
The Ceylon Electricity Board (Ceylon Electricity Board) is informed to refer to the CEB call center 1987 regarding electricity bills.

summary_lines: The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has updated its payment methods, including online banking and mobile app payments, making bill payments more efficient. Customers can use the CEBCare app, CEB and Bank KIOSS, or MCASH for electricity card payments. For inquiries, contact the CEB call center at 1987.
